definition: suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: And I really love the Junya Watanabe pieces that are in the next room.
sentences.chinese: 还有我真的很喜欢隔壁一间房间里渡边淳弥的衣服。

sentences.english: Watanabe's father is paralyzed, and he needs a machine to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 渡边的父亲瘫痪在床，需要靠仪器维持呼吸。
渡边靖说，“这是一个巨大的错误。

sentences.english: And Yasuhisa Shiozaki, a former chief cabinet secretary, has not accepted Mr Watanabe's entreaties to join him.
sentences.chinese: 前官房长官盐崎恭久也拒绝了渡边一同退党的要求。

sentences.english: Today, El Niñ os occur every 3 to 7 years on average, says Watanabe.
sentences.chinese: 渡边刚说，现在厄尔尼诺现象每隔3至7年发生一次。

sentences.english: Watanabe junichi is one of the representational writer of contemporary "Center Novel" in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 渡边淳一是日本当代“中间小说”代表作家之一。

sentences.english: Mr Watanabe has been a leading critic of Mr Aso's fiscal policy.
sentences.chinese: 渡边喜美一直是麻生太郎财政政策的主要批评者。

sentences.english: Today, El Niños occur every 3 to 7 years on average, says Watanabe.
sentences.chinese: 渡边刚说，现在厄尔尼诺现象每隔3至7年发生一次。

sentences.english: 'The market will remain at a weak level for the next year or two, ' Mr. Watanabe said.
sentences.chinese: 渡边捷昭表示，日本市场在今后一两年仍难有起色。

sentences.english: Goro Watanable is leaving for the United States and wants to buy some American dollars before he goes .
sentences.chinese: 渡边五郎准备前往美国，想在临走前买些美元。

sentences.english: 'The market will remain at a weak level for the next year or two,' Mr. Watanabe said.
sentences.chinese: 渡边捷昭表示，日本市场在今后一两年仍难有起色。

sentences.english: Watanabe began his career as an animator at age 20.
sentences.chinese: 渡边在20岁时就开始绘制卡通片。

sentences.english: I asked him if it was true that Mr Watanabe had visited Tanaku again.
sentences.chinese: 我问他渡边先生再次访问了汤纳库是否属实。

sentences.english: Thus, what thing is really the love which Watanabe of the narrator felt for "Norwegian Wood"?
sentences.chinese: 如此一來，叙述者渡边所感受到的戀爱到底是甚么呢？
